Property.name: isCustomAnim
Property.HelpText: Add custom animations (SA1 Punch, grinding...) Only work with Knuckles and Rouge. Disable this if you are experimenting crash during gameplay.

Property.name: isSA1Punch
Property.HelpText: Allow SA1 punch. (ONLY WORK WITH KNUCKLES AND REQUIRE CUSTOM ANIMATION ENABLED.)

Property.name: isRoll
Property.HelpText: Allow the hunters to roll so they can pass somersault obstacle.

Property.name: fastGlasses
Property.HelpText: Map the sunglasses on the d-pad (up) also let glasses ON when you jump. (NOT COMPATIBLE WITH KEYBOARD PLAYERS.)

Property.name: noFilter
Property.HelpText: Remove the blue filter when you have the sunglasses on.

Property.name: alwaysHunter
Property.HelpText: Always play one of the selected hunter.

Property.name: SA1PunchButton
Property.HelpText: Select the SA1 Punch button. (Note: you can't have others attacks mapped on the same button than SA2 Punch.)

Property.name: SA2PunchButton
Property.HelpText: Select the SA2 Punch/Kick button. (Note: you can't have others attacks mapped on the same button than SA2 Punch.)
